greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = (2^k - 1)^n, 1<=k<=n.
comment: T(n,k) is the number of n X k binary matrices with no 0 rows. The triangular array becomes a rectangular array by lifting the restriction on k. [From _Geoffrey Critzer_, Dec 03 2009]
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 26 2004
